schema.name: Budibase-File-Upload
schema.description: A Budibase form component that allows you to upload file and store them within a string in your database. The file is viewable and downloadable. This allows you store your files inside of your SQL or internal DB without using the default solution of a url to MinIO.
schema.info: Created by chungchunwang on GitHub at: https://github.com/chungchunwang/Budibase-File-Upload. You can find detailed instructions there. Please report any issues or feature requests to the GitHub repo (or perhaps star!).
